deleted.description: indicates if the resource was deleted or not

endDate.description: an iso-8601 date to indicate when the experience was ended

startDate.description: an iso-8601 date to indicate when the experience was started

externalId.description: external resource identifier (if provided by your own internal information system)

groups.description: array of group identifiers to filter on

users.description: array of user identifiers to filter on

family_tag.description: library's family tag. used to group libraries in wider domains

comparator.description: comparator used to compare the provided value

value.description: reference value that will be compared to the searched values

type.description: pin object's type. Can be either profile.pin_job or profile.pin_training.

active.description: indicates if the power is active or not

type.description: indicates the power degree : is user interested, want to learn, have the skill, want to upgrade, is it suggestion ?

custom_fields.description: any custom fields defined on the qualifier

qualifier_input_data.description: qualifier data to add on a power, skill, skills profile, ...

updated.description: an iso-8601 date to indicate when the qualifier was updated

data.description: list of power data used in matching computation

score.description: matching score of the search result regarding the search query (between 0 and 1)

boost.description: boost to apply to this should query condition

comparator.description: comparator used to compare the provided value

value.description: reference value that will be compared to the searched values

custom_fields.description: any custom fields defined on the skill

library_context.description: library context's identifier. defines the skill's main library context.

powerable.description: indicates if the skill can be added to an user as a power

validated.description: indicates if the skill was validated or not

custom_fields.description: any custom fields defined on the skill profile
list of custom fields you want to add on an user profile

last_login.description: an iso-8601 date to indicate when the qualifier was updated

context.description: indicates in which context the user was validated (on project, on a specific task, while analyzing conversations, ...)

user_context.description: indicates the context of the user who validated the skill (manager, bot, ...)

use_externalId_param.name: use_externalId

forbidden_error.description: you are not allowed to perform this action.
